name: 莊嶸騰
objective:
太空科技應用課程旨在探討太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，與太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的專題演講與小組討論，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
The aim of the Space Science & Technology Seminar is to enable students to understand and master practical skills and knowledge in the field of space engineering, as well as to cultivate their teamwork, problem-solving, and innovative thinking abilities. Students will undertake a practical space engineering design project to understand the design, testing, implementation, and management processes of space engineering through practice, and demonstrate project outcomes through reports, presentations, and assessments. Through this course, students can understand the latest developments in the field of space engineering, master relevant skills and knowledge, and enhance their teamwork and project management abilities. This course can also provide practical exercises through industry-academia collaboration.
schedule:
Week 1: Unit 1. Space technologies and applications
Week 2: Unit 2. Space exploration
Week 3: Unit 3. Earth observation
Week 4~6: Unit 4. Space communications
Week 7~8: Unit 5. Satellite navigation
Week 9: Midterm report
Week 10~12: Unit 6. Space Engineering
Week 13: Unit 7. Materials science
Week 14~15: Unit 8. Space biology and medicine
Week 16~17: Unit 9. Space economy and business.
Week 18: Final report
scorePolicy:
Class Participation (30%)
Midterm Report (30%)
Final Report (40%)
remarks: 第 17、18 週線上教學規劃：請學生準備數位報告材料，上傳雲端空間，提供教師線上評量。
